document.text:
From: 
To:" 
Cc: ' 
Subject: RE: Draft OCME Letter 
Date: Wed, 28 Aug 2019 01:11:44 +0000 
Attachments: 2019.08.28 Letter to OCME.ebd.docx 
Thanks. I'm operating on the assumption this letter, too, may someday be made public, so I think the less we say about 
specifics, the better. I would also ask tomorrow morning what exactly they need, since they may not need more than a 
high level request (and I would make the request about returning the 302 by phone only unless they push for it in 
writing). Happy to discuss though if you disagree. 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, August 27, 2019 7:27 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Draft OCME Letter 
â€¢ 
Please see attached for your review. We tried to keep this as brief as possible while still accurately describing the contents 
of their file that we do not want disclosed, and the circumstances under which they were disclosed. Let us know if you 
have any thoughts. Our call is at 10 tomorrow morning and we'd like to send this after the fact. I also spoke with the GC 
by phone tonight to give her a head's up that this was coming, and she did not have any issues with it. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
Tel: 
EFTA00028000
